protein.specific_function: Binds to activated (phosphorylated) protein-tyrosine kinases through its SH2 domain and regulates their kinase activity. During insulin stimulation, it also binds to IRS-1

reference.reference_text: Dey BR, Furlanetto RW, Nissley SP: Cloning of human p55 gamma, a regulatory subunit of phosphatidylinositol 3-kinase, by a yeast two-hybrid library screen with the insulin-like growth factor-I receptor. Gene. 1998 Mar 16;209(1-2):175-83.
